name: tree-util
description: A utility to create tree-formatted lists from file system paths

scripts.build:standalone: bun run build:pkg && pkg dist-pkg/src/cli.js --compress GZip
scripts.build:win: bun run build:pkg && pkg dist-pkg/src/cli.js --target node18-win-x64 --output bin/tree-util-win.exe --compress GZip
scripts.build:linux: bun run build:pkg && pkg dist-pkg/src/cli.js --target node18-linux-x64 --output bin/tree-util-linux --compress GZip
scripts.build:macos: bun run build:pkg && pkg dist-pkg/src/cli.js --target node18-macos-x64 --output bin/tree-util-macos --compress GZip
scripts.build:all: bun run build:pkg && pkg dist-pkg/src/cli.js --targets node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64,node18-macos-x64,node18-macos-arm64 --output bin/tree-util --compress GZip
